name: Torrone Cheesecake aka Hazelnut Cream in Disguise
description:
This is a very simple mix, 3 ingredients and sweetener.
FA Torrone is my favorite Hazelnut flavor as it transports a bit of a roasted smell throughout the mix.
To keep it creamy i added FLV Whipped Cream which isn't heavy on the vanilla note and Yes, We Cheesecake provides just the right cheesecake note to keep everything together.
Usually i vape with less than 1% sweetener, but here i tried it lower and it was missing a bit of punch in the vape so i upped it to 1% and i like it.
Please adjust you sweetener level as you like it...
author: Echodub
